author: buffalonews
title: Area colleges 1
text:
Area colleges
MEN’S SOCCER
Siena 2, Niagara 0
Marist 3, Canisius 2
St. Bonaventure 0, Binghamton 0 (2OT)
Buffalo State 5, D’Youville 1
ECC 1, Niagara CCC 0 (OT)

WOMEN’S SOCCER
Niagara 2, Siena 0
N (5-3-2, 3-0-0): Laura Ortiz g-a, Claire Feiertag shutout
Canisius 2, Marist 1 (2OT)
C (3-7-2, 1-2): Emily Kuta gwg
ECC 5, Niagara CCC 0
E: Lily Bergman (East Aurora) 3g-a
WOMEN’S VOLLEYBALL
Medaille 25-25-19-25, Hilbert 12-18-25-10
Houghton 25-25-25, D’Youville 21-14-18
MEN’S GOLF
Little Three Championship
at River Oaks
1. Canisius 770, T2. Niagara 772, T2. St. Bonaventure 772.
1. Josh Stauffer (SB) 148, 2. Daniel Weimer (N) 150, 3. Patrick Sheerer (SB) 151, 4. Cory Cullen (C) 152.
